title: Joe Jackson & Red Sox Team M101-2s + Others on eBay

posts.post_title: Joe Jackson & Red Sox Team M101-2s + Others on eBay
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Frank
We are breaking up a collection of M101-2 Sporting News Supplements and have listed them on eBay individually.  We have posted a Joe Jackson, Boston Red Sox Team, and several others.  More will be listed in the next two weeks.

If you are interested, check out the links below:

[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=8754185957&rd=1&sspagename=STRK%3AMESE%3AIT&rd=1[/url]

[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=8754185957&rd=1&sspagename=STRK%3AMESE%3AIT&rd=1[/url]

Be sure to supersize the images so you can check out the condition for each.

Click on "View seller's other items" to see all of them.
